import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { Country } from '../../interfaces/country'; @Component({ selector: 'countries-table', templateUrl: './country-table.component.html', styles: [ `img { width: 35px }` ] }) export class CountryTableComponent { @Input() public countries: Country[] = []; }
